resources.string:
Logic Grid Puzzles are solved by using the given clues to fill in a grid with ✓ (yes) and ✗ (no) marks.

1. Each clue gives you information about relationships between items.

2. Click a cell to cycle through ✓, ✗, and empty.

3. Use logic to determine which combinations are possible and which are not.

4. Each item in a category can only match with one item from each other category.

5. Complete the puzzle by filling all cells correctly!
